references: S. Falcon, Generalized Fibonacci Sequences Generated from a k-Fibonacci Sequence, Journal of Mathematics Research Vol. 4, No. 2; April 2012; http://journal.ccsenet.org/index.php/jmr/article/viewFile/14516/10822. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 22 2012
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (76, 1).
formula: G.f. x/(1-76*x-x^2), 76=L(9)=A000032(9) (Lucas).a(n)=76*a(n-1)+a(n-2), n>1 ; a(0)=0, a(1)=1 . [From _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Nov 23 2008]a(n) = (9*F(n) + (-1)^n*30*5*F(n)^3 + 27*5^2*F(n)^5 + (-1)^n*9*5^3*F(n)^7 + 5^4*F(n)^9)/34, n >= 0. See the general D. Jennings formula given in a comment on the triangle A111125, where also the reference is given. Here the fifth row (k=4) applies. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 01 2012
mathematica: Fibonacci[9Range[0,20]]/34 (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{76,1},{0,1},20] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 20 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jan 20 2000
